mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET EndTime = #{param3}, AttendanceStatus = CASE WHEN '18:00:00' >= EndTime THEN IF(AttendanceStatus LIKE '%정상출근%', AttendanceStatus, CONCAT( AttendanceStatus , '/조퇴')) ELSE IF(AttendanceStatus LIKE '%지각%', AttendanceStatus, CONCAT(AttendanceStatus, '/정상퇴근')) END WHERE userid = #{param1} AND date = #{param2};
